mutants.code:
from math import log2

def odd_triplets(n):
    limit = int(log2(n))
    cnt = 1
    for i in range(limit, -1, -1):
        j = n - (1 << i)
        if j < i:
            break
        cnt += 2 ** (min(i, j - i) - 1) - 2 ** (i // 2 - 1)
        cnt += 2 ** (min(i - 1, j - i) - 1) - 2 ** ((i - 1) // 2 - 1)
    return cnt

        cnt += 2 ** (min(i - 1, j - i) * 1) - 2 ** ((i - 1) // 2 - 1)
    return cnt

from math import log2

def odd_triplets(n):
    limit = int(log2(n))
    cnt = 0
    for i in range(limit, -1, -1):
        j = n - (1 << i)
        if j < i:
            break
        cnt += 2 ** (min(i, j - i) - 1) - 2 ** (i // 2 - 1)
        cnt += 2 ** (min(i - 1, j - i) - 1) - 3 ** ((i - 1) // 2 - 1)
    return cnt
